Dialogue.Lines: Oh you must be the new asp, My name is Agnar Thor Oskarsson. How are you?
Good, if you ever want to play a tune or drop some sick beats come find me!
Ah the music, the energy, the power can’t you just feel how it speaks to you?

Choices.Choice: NEUTRAL+Let’s play some music because I really want to C your D
GOOD+Let me blow your whistle baby, let me know
NEUTRAL+I want you to drop my pants like you drop the beat

Responses.Response: I will always drop it hard!
